brainly_data.question: Look at these posters about World War II. Choose one of the posters, and discuss its message in a brief essay of about 200–300 words. Be sure to start with a statement about which poster you have chosen. Describe how the artist uses graphic design and symbolism to convey the message. Also discuss the context in which the poster was created. Why did the US government decide this message was important?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: Look at these posters about World War II. Choose one of the posters, and discuss its message in a brief essay of about 200–300 words. Be sure to start with a statement about which poster you have chosen. Describe how the artist uses graphic design and symbolism to convey the message. Also discuss the context in which the poster was created. Why did the US government decide this message was important?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text:
Answer: I have chosen the "Train to be a Nurse Aid" poster. I have chosen this poster because it is urging woman totrain to be a nurse aid so they can help the injured soldiers at war. The US goverment felt this poster wasnecessary because troops were growing and many men were being injured along with other nurses 

Hope it helps
